feed.title: SAP Community - ABAP Cloud
feed.subtitle: ABAP Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: ABAP RAP - Date field value help with future dates disabled?
entry.content:
Hello SAP ABAP RAP Experts,

Is it possible to disable the future dates in the value help of a date field in SAP RAP application?

For example, if today is 22nd July 2025, the value help should show the future dates, i.e. 22nd July onwards as greyed out/disabled and therefore not allowing the user to select future dates.

Just FYI. We are currently handling this requirement based on a validation on save. Is there any other efficient way of handling this?

Thanks!

entry.title: Scalar functions on CDS views
entry.content:
I have created and defined a scalar function called ZWBS_Description.

When implementing the function in the method returnWbsDescription in the corresponding amdp class, the method configuration that provides the result is already set ( in the scalar function definition and implementation reference).

I now would like to create the return value for my scalar function.
(The datasource, is a cds view entity ( based on an SAP table).)

My issue is, that I can't make a select on a CDS view. I get the following error.

In a table function the client dependency can be controlled, but I don't think that is possible for a scalar function. ( The annotation is not allowed. Makes sense, as the client field is always set in a CDS view in the background.)

I have taken a deep dive in the documentation
ABAP CDS - Scalar Functions | ABAP Keyword Documentation
but I can't find any solution regarding that.

My question is now, is it even possible to use a CDS view as a data source?
And on top of that, why (again) are we limited to SQLScript instead if ABAP SQL ?


More background information

entry.title: Possibility for Mass Production Order Confirmation in Foreground from template in SAP Public Cloud?
entry.content:
Hi,

We have a requirement, where users perform "Mass Confirmation of production order's" through Excel template. Also, the confirmation screen - CO11N have certain validations (using Badi) in place for the order to be confirmed.

Each order is confirmed in foreground, allowing users to manipulate "Goods movement data - yield Qty, posting date, Storage location, Execution date, Component Qty" to be within validations placed. This is possible in ECC.

Requirement in Public cloud system:

1) User should be able to upload list of Production orders with other info through Template.

2) User should perform confirmation in the foreground with data picked from template and also allowing to change on screen confirmation data.

Has anyone achieved or any possible leads for the same to be replicated in SAP Public Cloud environment?

Thankyou.

entry.title: Dear SAP BTP Trial Support Team,
entry.content:
Dear SAP BTP Trial Support Team/ ABAP TEAM,

I’m currently using the SAP BTP ABAP Environment trial (User ID: GE202076), and I’m facing persistent activation issues with a CDS view.

I’ve followed all RAP and CDS conventions using `define root view entity` based on the recommended replacement entity `I_BUSINESSUSERBASIC`.

However, every attempt to activate the CDS fails with errors like:

- The column BUSINESSUSER is unknown

- The column EMAILADDRESS is unknown

- The column ISLOCKED is unknown

- The column LOGONNAME is unknown

I’ve also tried switching to fields like `firstname`, `lastname`, `emailaddress`, and `businesspartner`, but the activation consistently fails—even in newly created CDS views with correct templates and package setup.

I’ve followed every clean step using Eclipse ADT, project `TDI_EN`, and package `ZGE202076A`, and validated field names via `Ctrl + Space` in the Outline view.

Could you please help me:

  1. Confirm the available fields in `I_BUSINESSUSERBASIC` in my trial tenant 
  2. Identify whether this is a metadata replication/cache issue 
  3. Suggest if another CDS (like `I_EMPLOYEESIMPLE` or similar) should be used instead

Looking forward to your guidance.

Thanks

Best regards, 

**Madhulatha Pelluri**

entry.title: BADI Recommendation for Vendor Balance Validation in FB65 in public cloud
entry.content:
Dear Team,

We have a business requirement where users should be allowed to post an FB65 transaction (Create Incoming Invoice) only if the vendor has a NIL or debit balance (that is, the vendor balance must be greater than or equal to zero).

Could you please advise which BADI can be used to implement this validation

Thanks & Regards

Dedipya

entry.title: BAdI (MRM_WT_SPLIT_UPDATE) that is not released in S/4HANA Cloud Private edition
entry.content:
Hi all,

As per my knowledge, the "Tier 2 wrapper" concept is primarily designed for exposing non-released SAP APIs (like BAPIs or Classes) in a way that allows them to be used within the ABAP Cloud framework (Tier 1) while ensuring upgradeability and compliance with the Cloud model. Therefore, non-released BAdIs are generally handled in Tier 3, utilizing classic ABAP development.

Could you please correct me if I am wrong? I would appreciate it if you share your experiences on non-released BAdIs in S/4HANA Cloud Private edition.

Thanks in advance.

entry.title: How to create dynamic value help cds views for domain value?
entry.content:
I create my domain value help like this. 

define view entity x
    as select from dd07t
{
    @ObjectModel.text.element: ['ddtext']
    key domvalue_l as domvalue,
    ddtext
}
where 
    domname = 'x'
    and as4local = 'A'
    and ddlanguage = $session.system_language

"Then use this value help like this 
@Consumption: { valueHelpDefinition: [{ entity: {name: 'X', element: 'domvalue'}}]}

The 'Problem' with this solution is i have to create a new cds view for each domain. I am looking for a more generic approach.

Is there a way to define one value help cds view and use this for all domains? Like the following idea. (Syntax is false, just want to show what i mean)

define view entity GENERIC_DOMAIN_VH
    as select from dd07t
{
    @ObjectModel.text.element: ['ddtext'] 
    key domvalue_l as domvalue,
    ddtext
}
where 
    domname = @parameter
    and as4local = 'A'
    and ddlanguage = $session.system_language

@Consumption: { valueHelpDefinition: [{ entity: {name: 'GENERIC_VALUE_HELP', element: <domainname>}}], filter: { multipleSelections: false} }

I tried it with association inside my cds view and parameter in the value help but without success.

entry.title: Which API should be used to create an Invoice and also pull in Trading Partner(VBUND)
entry.content: We are trying to use API to pull in details for creating an invoice.  Trading Partner is a requirement.  Which API can be used that would include Trading Partner(VBUND)?

entry.content:
Hi!

  Is there a Equivalent function ‘ENQUEUE_E_DSVAS_TRDIR’ in S4HANA?

Thanks!

entry.title: Using Custom Business Configuration in standalone ABAP Cloud
entry.content:
Hello,
I am currently trying to follow the tutorial “Create Business Configuration Maintenance Object.”

In the third step, I am supposed to use the “Custom Business Configurations” app. Unfortunately, this app is not available in a pure cloud ABAP system (without S/4 Hana).

What are my options?
A) Can I install the application somehow?
B) Is it possible to use the BC app from another S/4 account?

Best Regards
Uwe

entry.title: How can I fetch user Default Values using an ABAP Restfull Application Programming action
entry.content:
Hello Expert,

I am currently working on an ABAP Restfull Application Programming action, which have to verify some fields, using the user Default Values as bellow :

I would like to fetch the default plant of the user (the one calling the action).
I didn't found any CDS View or API on SAP Business Hub, which would provide me with those default values.
Is there any way to do this ?
Thanks in advance

entry.title: Automatic Batch/Serial No Determination in vl01n
entry.content:
Hi Everyone,

 

We are automating batch and serial number determination during outbound delivery.

  • Batch should be determined automatically.

  • Serial numbers (received from a third-party system and stored in a custom table) should be assigned automatically when navigating to Extras → Serial Numbers.

For batch determination, I found the exit USEREXIT_BATCH_DETERMINATION.
Could you please suggest which exit or BAdI can be used for automatic serial number assignment?

Is there any Other ways to approach this requirement?

entry.title: ABAP2XLSX alternative in Public Cloud
entry.content:
Unfortunately, XCO-related classes do not fully meet our requirements; therefore, I am exploring the ABAP2XLSX class.
However, it appears that ABAP2XLSX is not supported in the Public Cloud.

Could you suggest alternative approaches to generate complex(with column grouping, coloring etc. ) Excel files in an Embedded Steampunk environment?

entry.title: Erro “Destination not found” ao usar ABAP Cloud para consumir API via BTP
entry.content:
Olá pessoal,

Estou tentando consumir a API API_BUSINESS_PARTNER do SAP S/4HANA Cloud usando ABAP Cloud no SAP BTP. Meu código utiliza cl_http_destination_provider create_by_cloud_destination para criar o cliente HTTP, mas estou recebendo o erro:  Destino não encontrado.

Verifiquei a minha subconta de teste e existe um destino chamado S4HANA_API.

entry.title: gCTS - Backup and Restore specific ABAP Object - Git
entry.content:
Using gCTS, the objects are backed up to the GitHub Repository.  If a specific object needs to be restored from Git to On-Premises System, there is no option for it in gCTS. 

It is possible to Push to Git Repository by TR/Package/Object specific. To restore, only 'Current Commit' and 'Last Repository Action' is available in gCTS. 

Purpose of restoring specific objects: If a specific Git Repo is used as backup option to Retire some ABAP Objects, in some case, the retired/deleted object specific to RICEFW may need to be restored. At that point, other Retired ABAP Objects is not needed for Restore. Only Selected-Specific objects needs to be Pulled to SAP System. 

How will I retore specific object? Any alternate way?

entry.title: Error creating transport request ERP public cloud
entry.content:
Hi Community!

I attempted to create a new, transportable package outside of the ZLOCAL component. However, the system still produces an error when I try to create the transportation.

I suspect the root cause may not be just the package type, but the extension methodology itself. My understanding is that for S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, classic extensions (like creating an ENHO object from Eclipse) are not permitted in order to maintain a "Clean Core." Instead, the recommended approach is to use the "Custom Logic" Fiori app to implement BAdIs that SAP has explicitly released for the cloud.

 

My specific question is: Is the BADI_WHT BAdI enabled for extension via Eclipse ADT in our public cloud environment, or is it mandatory that we find an alternative, released BAdI within the "Custom Logic" app?

 

I am attaching screenshots of the new error I receive when using the transportable package.

 

I appreciate your guidance in ensuring we are using the correct extensibility method for our platform.

 

Best regards,

 

Diana
I only have ZLOCAL and Z001 for superpackage

more information (my question):
https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-q-a/error-creating-badi-enhancement-implementation-quot-sap-object-enhs-cannot/qaq-p/14195538 

BaDI: https://api.sap.com/badi/BADI_FIBRREI_WHT

entry.title: ATC Cloud readiness
entry.content:
I tried integrating the cloudification repository with my custom atc variant through the following link
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SAP/abap-atc-cr-cv-s4hc/main/src/objectReleaseInfoLatest.json
I added the above link in the configs for the atc 

But since the json present in the above link has multiple checks like BAPI's,DTEL's,FM's and since i only wanted the checks for deprecated tables I thought of creating a custom SICF service which will filter the JSON from the above endpoint and return a modified json containing only the checks for deprecated tables but when I went ahead and pasted the url of my SICF service in the config section i got the following error 

Can this be fixed or is there any other way to get the result that i want.

Thanks

entry.title: Need latest C_ABAPD_2507 version
entry.content:
I’m happy to share that I’ve successfully passed the SAP Certified Associate – ABAP Development (C_ABAPD_2507) exam! 

For my preparation, I relied on a combination of trusted resources:

  • Official SAP Materials – including SAP Learning Hub and ABAP documentation, which provided a strong foundation in ABAP programming concepts, CDS views, OData, and integration with SAP S/4HANA.

  • ITExamspro – offered well-structured practice questions and mock tests that closely reflected the real exam style, giving me confidence on test day.

  • Community Resources – such as blogs, YouTube tutorials, and SAP Community discussions, which helped me understand practical use cases and real-world coding examples.

My focus areas were ABAP Core Data Services (CDS), ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model (RAP), OData services, and ABAP on SAP HANA – as these are key topics in the exam.

entry.title: Please tell me how to create an ABAP project in Eclipse and connect it to the S/4 HANA Cloud develop
entry.content:
I am looking for a way to create an ABAP project and connect to the S/4 HANA Cloud development environment. If there is a website that describes the specific creation method, please let me know.

*The ABAP environment has been set up in Eclipse.

entry.title: Error when creating a ABAP project in Eclipse for S/4 Hana public cloud development environment
entry.content:
Currently, I am creating an ABAP project in Eclipse for  s/4 Hana public cloud development environment. As a result of following the method described in (detailed procedure), a connection error occurred. Please tell me the specific way to address this issue. 

 

(detailed procedure)

1.In the File menu, choose New > ABAP Project.

 

2.Choose one from the list and clicked 「Next >」

3.In Connection Settings, Entered like below.
*The IP address has been identified through a ping check.

 

4.In Logon to System,Entered like below.
